crypto.name: Blocky Noncense
crypto.desc: I designed this foolproof signing blockchain. I'll even let you sign as many signatures as you want!

crypto.name: Circles
crypto.desc: We have this encrypted file and the only information we got is that the key follows the pattern of 1,2,4,8,16,.... Can you figure out what the key is and decrypt this file?

crypto.name: lottery
crypto.desc: Can you break this lottery service and guarantee a profit in the long run?

forensic.name: 1black0white
forensic.desc: We received this file of seemingly random numbers, but the person that sent it is adamant that it is a QR code. Can you figure it out for us?

forensic.name: Br3akTh3Vau1t
forensic.desc:
'Greed is good.'

    Gordon Gekko

Come and Break My Vault

intro.name: Babys First
intro.desc: Reversing means reading code. Read this file, and find the flag!

intro.name: Babys Third
intro.desc: Babies can't count, but they can do binaries?

intro.name: my first pwnie
intro.desc: You must be this 👉 high to ride.

intro.name: puffin
intro.desc: Huff, puff, and blow that buffer over.

intro.name: target practice
intro.desc: Aim carefully... This pwnie can JUMP!

intro.name: whataxor
intro.desc: Now you actually need to figure what the binary is doing.......maybe try a tool like https://dogbolt.org/; It shows you the output of several tools that try to extract a representation similar to what the original code might have looked like.....which is a lot nicer than reading bytes.

misc.name: stonk
misc.desc:
I found this cool stock trading platform and I was able to exfil the server applets app.py and process.py, I have also attached user.py from one of the interns that built the client applet, can you rake banks?


Please use the following links while we investigate a fix for the challenge.

pwn.name: Super Secure Heap
pwn.desc: The most secure heap you've ever seen!

pwn.name: double zer0 dilemma
pwn.desc: The house always wins... or does it?

pwn.name: unlimited subway
pwn.desc: Imagine being able to ride the subway for free, forever.

rev.name: Impossibrawler
rev.desc: How do I beat these guys?!

rev.name: Rebug 1
rev.desc: Can't seem to print out the flag :( Can you figure out how to get the flag with this binary?

rev.name: Rebug 2
rev.desc: No input this time ;) Try to get the flag from the binary. When you find the answer of the program, please submit the flag in the following format: csawctf{output}

rev.name: rox
rev.desc:
I'm trying to find the password in a sea of flags... something's weird about this file.

Note: please enclose the flag in csawctf{} before submitting, i.e. csawctf{fake_flag}

web.name: MTA Prices
web.desc: The MTA has rose the single-ride subway fare to $2.90!! Log into the admin MTA account and change the price back down to $2.75. You have already collected a partial list of the column names.

web.name: rainbow notes
web.desc: I really like rainbows, so I tried making this secure note taking app. With rainbows.
